sourceMeaningMnemonic: Hit by a <radical>tsunami</radical> the <radical>drunkard</radical> is propelled down a <radical>slide</radical> where he hits the <radical>ground</radical> which is covered in <radical>fire</radical>. He is immediately <kanji>destroy</kanji>ed.
meaningInfo: Even if he wasn't saved by the slide (to avoid the tsunami) he would be in trouble. Seems like the world just wanted to <kanji>destroy</kanji> this drunkard.
readingMnemonic: One could say this drunkard <reading>met</reading> (<ja>めつ</ja>) his fate.
readingInfo: Strangely, he just came from a <reading>Mets</reading> (<ja>めつ</ja>) game, so maybe that's why he had such bad luck.
